summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 23rd Avenue South, from Rainier Avenue to Walker Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 117669 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
